languages.text: Forge worlds are the domain of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Entire planets ceded to the demands of vast macro-industries, each is a manufacturing super-complex of unimaginable capacity and power. Over the millennia, different forge worlds have become especially renowned for their philosophies or ways of war. These are often coloured by the technologies they specialise in manufacturing. The bulk of a forge world's population is utilised as a labour force, whilst the fortunate few may be inducted into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus itself.
languages.original_text: Миры-кузни — это владения Адептус Механикус. В них целые планеты переоборудованы под нужды всевозможных макропроизводств. Каждая из них благословлена уровнем технологий, недосягаемым для большинства миров Империума. В лабиринтах из пластали и ферробетона технические таинства и чудеса стали обычным делом. Под управлением магосов из культа Механикус большая часть населения в таких мирах используется в качестве рабочей силы. Но редкие счастливцы могут получить ранг самих Адептус Механикус.

traits.locale_text: Forge worlds are the domain of the Adeptus Mechanicus, entire planets ceded to the demands of vast macro-industries. Each is blessed with a level of technology unseen in the wider Imperium as a whole, and many arcane wonders are commonplace in their labyrinths of ferrocrete and plasteel. Under the direction of Magi of the Cult Mechanicus, the bulk of a forge world's population is utilised as a labour force, whilst the fortunate few may be inducted into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus itself.

Forge worlds are the domain of the Adeptus Mechanicus, entire planets ceded to the demands of vast macro-industries. Each is blessed with a level of technology unseen in the wider Imperium as a whole, and many arcane wonders are commonplace in their labyrinths of ferrocrete and plasteel. Under the direction of Magi of the Cult Mechanicus, the bulk of a forge world's population is utilised as a labour force, whilst the fortunate few may be inducted into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus itself.

Forge worlds are the domain of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Entire planets ceded to the demands of vast macro-industries, each is a manufacturing super-complex of unimaginable capacity and power. Over the millennia, different forge worlds have become especially renowned for their philosophies or ways of war. These are often coloured by the technologies they specialise in manufacturing. The bulk of a forge world's population is utilised as a labour force, whilst the fortunate few may be inducted into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus itself.

languages.text: Fabrikwelten sind die Domäne des Adeptus Mechanicus. Ganze Planeten, die den Anforderungen riesiger Makro-Industrien unterworfen sind, stellen jeder für sich einen Fertigungs-Superkomplex mit unermesslicher Kapazität und Macht dar. Im Laufe der Jahrtausende wurden verschiedene Fabrikwelten vor allem für ihre Philosophien oder ihre Kriegsmethoden bekannt. Diese sind oft durch die Technologien geprägt, auf deren Produktion sie spezialisiert sind. Der Großteil der Bevölkerung einer Fabrikwelt wird als Arbeitskräfte eingesetzt, während einige wenige Glückliche in die Reihen des Adeptus Mechanicus aufgenommen werden können.
languages.original_text: Forge worlds are the domain of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Entire planets ceded to the demands of vast macro-industries, each is a manufacturing super-complex of unimaginable capacity and power. Over the millennia, different forge worlds have become especially renowned for their philosophies or ways of war. These are often coloured by the technologies they specialise in manufacturing. The bulk of a forge world's population is utilised as a labour force, whilst the fortunate few may be inducted into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus itself.

traits.locale_text: Fabrikwelten sind die Domäne des Adeptus Mechanicus, ganze Planeten, die den Anforderungen riesiger Makro-Industrien unterworfen sind. Sie sind mit einer Technologie gesegnet, die im gesamten Imperium unbekannt ist, und viele arkane Wunder sind in ihren Labyrinthen aus Ferrobeton und Plaststahl alltäglich. Unter der Leitung von Magi des Kult Mechanicus wird der Großteil der Bevölkerung einer Fabrikwelt als Arbeitskräfte eingesetzt, während die wenigen Glücklichen in die Reihen des Adeptus Mechanicus aufgenommen werden können.

languages.text: Les mondes forge sont sous le contrôle de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Des mondes entiers à la botte de gigantesques macro-industries, de monumentales usines d'une capacité et d'une puissance inimaginable. Au fil des millénaires, différents mondes forges ont gagné en renommée pour leur philosophie ou leur façon d'envisager la guerre. Ils s'appuient généralement sur les technologies qu'ils fabriquent. L'écrasante majorité de la population d'un monde forge sert de main-d'œuvre, tandis que les plus chanceux se voient offrir la chance de rejoindre les rangs de l'Adeptus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: Forge worlds are the domain of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Entire planets ceded to the demands of vast macro-industries, each is a manufacturing super-complex of unimaginable capacity and power. Over the millennia, different forge worlds have become especially renowned for their philosophies or ways of war. These are often coloured by the technologies they specialise in manufacturing. The bulk of a forge world's population is utilised as a labour force, whilst the fortunate few may be inducted into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus itself.

traits.locale_text: Les mondes forge sont sous le contrôle de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Des mondes entiers à la botte de gigantesques macro-industries, de monumentales usines d'une capacité et d'une puissance inimaginable. Au fil des millénaires, différents mondes forges ont gagné en renommée pour leur philosophie ou leur façon d'envisager la guerre. Ils s'appuient généralement sur les technologies qu'ils fabriquent. L'écrasante majorité de la population d'un monde forge sert de main-d'œuvre, tandis que les plus chanceux se voient offrir la chance de rejoindre les rangs de l'Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: 铸造世界是机械修会的领地。在铸造世界中，整颗行星都被改造成了宏伟的工业基地。每个铸造世界都是错综复杂的制造中心，拥有令人难以想象的能效与力量。几千年来，不同的铸造世界形成了各自不同的哲学理念与战争风格。这些理念与风格名闻遐迩，往往受到这些世界各自从事的铸造技术影响。铸造世界绝大部分人口都被用作劳动力，而少数幸运儿则可能会加入机械修会的行列。
languages.original_text: Forge worlds are the domain of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Entire planets ceded to the demands of vast macro-industries, each is a manufacturing super-complex of unimaginable capacity and power. Over the millennia, different forge worlds have become especially renowned for their philosophies or ways of war. These are often coloured by the technologies they specialise in manufacturing. The bulk of a forge world's population is utilised as a labour force, whilst the fortunate few may be inducted into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus itself.

traits.locale_text: 铸造世界是机械修会的领地，行星表面充斥着恢弘的巨型工业建筑。每颗行星都拥有整个帝国前所未闻的先进科技，无数神秘奇迹孕育在岩凝土与塑钢构成的巨型迷宫之中。在机械修会贤者的指导下，铸造世界的绝大部分人口都当做劳力使用，少数幸运之人可能会加入机械修会的行列。

languages.text: Los mundos forja son el dominio del Adeptus Mechanicus, planetas enteros dedicados a atender a las exigencias de diversas macroindustrias. Cada uno de estos mundos es un supercomplejo de fabricación cuya capacidad y potencia superan lo imaginable. A lo largo de los milenios, los diversos mundos forja han alcanzado la fama por sus diferentes filosofías y conceptos de la guerra, que a menudo se basan en las tecnologías en las que se especializan.La mayor parte de la población de un mundo forja sirve como mano de obra, aunque unos pocos afortunados pueden entrar a formar parte del propio Adeptus Mechanicu
languages.original_text: Forge worlds are the domain of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Entire planets ceded to the demands of vast macro-industries, each is a manufacturing super-complex of unimaginable capacity and power. Over the millennia, different forge worlds have become especially renowned for their philosophies or ways of war. These are often coloured by the technologies they specialise in manufacturing. The bulk of a forge world's population is utilised as a labour force, whilst the fortunate few may be inducted into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus itself.

traits.locale_text: Los mundos forja son el dominio del Adeptus Mechanicus, planetas enteros dedicados a atender a las exigencias de diversas macroindustrias. Cada uno goza de un nivel de tecnología que nunca se vería en el resto del Imperium y las maravillas tecnológicas abundan en sus laberintos de ferrocemento y plastiacero. Bajo la dirección de los Magos del Culto Mechanicus, la mayor parte de la población de un mundo forja sirve como mano de obra, aunque unos pocos afortunados pueden entrar a formar parte del propio Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: 工業惑星は帝国技術局の領域であり、惑星全体が大規模産業の需要に割り当てられており、それぞれが想像を絶する能力とパワーを持つ製造業の超複雑体となっている。数千年にわたり、さまざまな工業惑星がその哲学や戦争の手法で特に名を上げた。これらはしばしば、彼らの製造に特化した技術によって彩られる。工業惑星の人口の大部分は労働力として活用され、その中でも幸運な数人が帝国技術局に参画することができる。
languages.original_text: Forge worlds are the domain of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Entire planets ceded to the demands of vast macro-industries, each is a manufacturing super-complex of unimaginable capacity and power. Over the millennia, different forge worlds have become especially renowned for their philosophies or ways of war. These are often coloured by the technologies they specialise in manufacturing. The bulk of a forge world's population is utilised as a labour force, whilst the fortunate few may be inducted into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus itself.

traits.locale_text: 工業惑星は帝国技術局の領域であり、惑星全体が大規模産業の需要に割り当てられている。それぞれが、帝国全体では見られないレベルの技術に恵まれており、フェロクリートやプラスチールの迷宮では、多くの難解な驚異が当たり前のように存在している。機械教団の賢人の指揮のもと、工業惑星の人口の大部分は労働力として活用され、その中でも幸運な数人が帝国技術局に参画することができる。

languages.text: Миры-кузни — это владения Адептус Механикус. В них целые планеты переоборудованы под нужды всевозможных макропроизводств. Каждая из них благословлена уровнем технологий, недосягаемым для большинства миров Империума. В лабиринтах из пластали и ферробетона технические таинства и чудеса стали обычным делом. Под управлением магосов из культа Механикус большая часть населения в таких мирах используется в качестве рабочей силы. Но редкие счастливцы могут получить ранг самих Адептус Механикус.

Each is blessed with a level of technology unseen in the wider Imperium as a whole, and many arcane wonders are commonplace in their labyrinths of ferrocrete and plasteel. Under the direction of Magi of the Cult Mechanicus, the bulk of a forge world's population is utilised as a labour force, whilst the fortunate few may be inducted into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus itself.

Под управлением магосов из культа Механикус большая часть населения в таких мирах используется в качестве рабочей силы. Но редкие счастливцы могут получить ранг самих Адептус Механикус.
